TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Group extends System.Text.RegularExpressions.Capture

summary.span: 表示来自单个捕获组的结果。

span.span: Represents the results from a single capturing group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 捕获组可以捕获零、 一个或多个字符串中单个匹配项，因为存在的限定符。A capturing group can capture zero, one, or more strings in a single match because of quantifiers. (有关详细信息，请参阅[限定符](~/docs/standard/base-types/quantifiers-in-regular-expressions.md)。)单个捕获组匹配的所有子字符串中提供了属性。(For more information, see [Quantifiers](~/docs/standard/base-types/quantifiers-in-regular-expressions.md).) All the substrings matched by a single capturing group are available from the property. 有关捕获的最后一个子字符串的信息可以直接从访问`Value`和`Index`属性。Information about the last substring captured can be accessed directly from the `Value` and `Index` properties. (这就是，则实例是否等效于返回的集合的最后一项属性，它反映最后一个捕获组执行的捕获。)(That is, the instance is equivalent to the last item of the collection returned by the property, which reflects the last capture made by the capturing group.) 示例有助于阐明之间的关系对象和返回属性。An example helps to clarify this relationship between a object and the that is returned by the property. 正则表达式模式`(\b(\w+?)[,:;]?\s?)+[?.!]`匹配整个句子。The regular expression pattern `(\b(\w+?)[,:;]?\s?)+[?.!]` matches entire sentences. 该正则表达式的定义如下表所示。The regular expression is defined as shown in the following table. |模式Pattern|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| |`\b`|在单词边界处开始匹配。Begin the match at a word boundary.| |`(\w+?)`|匹配一个或多个单词字符，但字符要尽可能的少。Match one or more word characters, but as few characters as possible. 这是第二个 （内部） 的捕获组。This is the second (inner) capturing group. (第一个捕获组包括`\b`语言元素。)(The first capturing group includes the `\b` language element.)| |`[,:;]?`|匹配零个或一个匹配项的逗号、 冒号或分号。Match zero or one occurrence of a comma, colon, or semicolon.| |`\s?`|匹配空白字符的零个或一个匹配项。Match zero or one occurrence of a white-space character.| |`(\b(\w+?)[,:;]?\s?)+`|匹配单词边界、 一个或多个单词字符、 一个标点符号，以及包含空白字符一个或多个时间模式。Match the pattern consisting of a word boundary, one or more word characters, a punctuation symbol, and a white-space character one or more times. 这是第一个捕获组。This is the first capturing group.| |`[?.!]`|匹配句号、 问号或感叹号的任何匹配项。Match any occurrence of a period, question mark, or exclamation point.| 在此正则表达式模式中，子模式`(\w+?)`旨在匹配句子中的多个单词。In this regular expression pattern, the subpattern `(\w+?)` is designed to match multiple words within a sentence. 但是，值对象表示仅的最后一个匹配`(\w+?)`捕获，而属性返回表示所有捕获的文本。However, the value of the object represents only the last match that `(\w+?)` captures, whereas the property returns a that represents all captured text. 如输出所示，对于第二个捕获组包含四个对象。As the output shows, the for the second capturing group contains four objects. 最后一项对应于对象。The last of these corresponds to the object. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.class/cs/groupandcaptures1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.class/vb/groupandcaptures1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Captures As CaptureCollection

summary.span: 按从里到外、从左到右的顺序获取由捕获组匹配的所有捕获的集合（如果正则表达式用 选项修改了，则顺序为按从里到外、从右到左）。

span.span: Gets a collection of all the captures matched by the capturing group, in innermost-leftmost-first order (or innermost-rightmost-first order if the regular expression is modified with the option).

summary.span: 该集合可以有零个或更多的项。

span.span: The collection may have zero or more items.

value.span: 由该组匹配的子字符串的集合。

span.span: The collection of substrings matched by the group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果限定符不应用于捕获组，返回的集合属性包含一个对象，提供有关为相同的子字符串的信息对象。If a quantifier is not applied to a capturing group, the collection returned by the property contains a single object that provides information about the same substring as the object. 下列示例对此进行了阐释。This is illustrated in the following example. 它定义正则表达式， `\b(\w+)\b`，提取单个单词从一个句子。It defines a regular expression, `\b(\w+)\b`, that extracts a single word from a sentence. 对象捕获单词"This"，并且中的单个对象包含相同的捕获有关的信息。The object captures the word "This", and the single object in the contains information about the same capture. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.captures/cs/captures1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.captures/vb/captures1.vb#1)] 真正的实用程序限定符应用于捕获组，以便组捕获单个正则表达式中的多个子时发生属性。The real utility of the property occurs when a quantifier is applied to a capturing group so that the group captures multiple substrings in a single regular expression. 在这种情况下，对象包含有关最后一个捕获的子字符串的信息，而属性包含有关已捕获的组的所有子字符串的信息。In this case, the object contains information about the last captured substring, whereas the property contains information about all the substrings captured by the group. 在下面的示例中，正则表达式`\b(\w+\s*)+\.`匹配以句点结束的整个语句。In the following example, the regular expression `\b(\w+\s*)+\.` matches an entire sentence that ends in a period. 组`(\w+\s*)+`捕获集合中的各单词。The group `(\w+\s*)+` captures the individual words in the collection. 因为集合仅包含有关信息的最后一个捕获子字符串，它会捕获该句中"句子"最后一个单词。Because the collection contains information only about the last captured substring, it captures the last word in the sentence, "sentence". 但是，是从返回的集合可用的组捕获的每个单词属性。However, each word captured by the group is available from the collection returned by the property. [!code-csharp[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.captures/cs/captures2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group.Captures#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.text.regularexpressions.group.captures/vb/captures2.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回由当前实例表示的捕获组的名称。

span.span: Returns the name of the capturing group representing by the current instance.

value.span: 由当前实例表示的捕获组的名称。

span.span: The name of the capturing group represented by the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Success As Boolean
public: property bool Success { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示匹配是否成功。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the match is successful.

value.span: 如果匹配成功，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the match is successful; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Success`属性为 true，如果至少一个子字符串捕获在此组。The `Success` property is true if at least one substring was captured by this group. 它相当于布尔表达式 (Group.Captures.Count > 0)。It is equivalent to the Boolean expression (Group.Captures.Count > 0).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group Synchronized(class System.Text.RegularExpressions.Group inner) cil managed
Public Shared Function Synchronized (inner As Group) As Group

summary.span: 返回一个与提供的对象等效的 对象，在多个线程间共享该对象是安全的。

span.span: Returns a object equivalent to the one supplied that is safe to share between multiple threads.

returns.span: 一个正则表达式 对象。
